name: A Hero Named Axol
description:
A game originally created for the 2021 Secret Santa jam

This is only the second ever game I've published, and the first one I'd actually consider a game. There is still a lot I plan on adding in the future, so watch development with excitement!

In this game you play as just your average everyday axolotl named Axol. Traverse the dangerous caves and the [soon to come] in order to save the world as you know it!
